website_summaries.verdict: This is the type of subwoofer you want to choose when you need the best sound results with a value price tag. Best for budget projects.
pros: Simple design and construction makes it relatively easy to install and use as a subwoofer replacement for most vehicles
Uses a speaker design that creates a surprisingly flat and neutral dynamic range
cons: Not the best choice if you are wanting a drastic improvement over your car’s factory installed sound system

customer_reviews.title: PYLE 10 INCH BASS SPEAKER
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A WELL BUILT SUB. QUALITY APPEARANCE AND MATERIALS. I PUT ONE IN A CUBIC FOOT SOCHIE WEDGE CARPETED SEALED BOX. I CAUTION THAT PYLE TENDS TO THROW WATTAGE NUMBERS AROUND AND BUMP THEM UP IN EVERYTHING THEY MANUFACTURE, SO DO NOT BELIEVE THE NUMBERS. I DOUBT THIS SUB CAN TAKE 1000 WATTS RMS WITHOUT EXPLODING, BUT FEED IT 200 CLEAN WATTS AND THE BASS IS GOOD. IF YOU ARE ON A BUDGET, THIS SUB WILL ADD THE MISSING BASS YOU NEED IN YOUR SOUND SYSTEM. Update 7/10/15...finally put it into service...it was popping and could not handle power...removed it from the car and going with another brand of sub.
customer_reviews.author: VIPERICHNAPLES

customer_reviews.title: this is a great speaker
customer_reviews.text: i bought this and the Pyramid PB717X 1,000 watt amp. thinking I would be lucky if I could use it at 20% power and get alittle bit of thump. Let me tell you I can turn it up enough that it hurts my ears after awhile. I bridged the amp and I'm telling you most of my friends are really impressed with the set up and when I tell them how much it cost. its a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: william mutton

customer_reviews.title: Hits Hard
customer_reviews.text: I dont really know anything about ohms and hz's and everything like most people in the comments are talking about but I know the more watts the sub has and the bigger it is that harder it hits (at least that's my understanding of it). And I just wanted something that would give my car some sick bass, I bought this and and 18' sub hooked up to my 3000 watt amp and I'm 100% satisfied. I love it and would totally recommend it to anyone looking to add some style to their ride.
customer_reviews.author: Alex C. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Save your money for something better
customer_reviews.text: This subwoofer is okay by the looks. I hooked it up to a Renegade 850s amp. Bridged the sub from 4 ohms to 2 ohms. It hits pretty hard with mid bass and high bass. It's weak when it comes to low bass. The center plastic is what ruins the subwoofer. It makes a nasty rattle sound when it is hitting. It's not the wires behind the sub nor the box. Get a sub other than Pyle cause these subs aren't that great.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: I would of gave it 5 stars but needing so ...
customer_reviews.text: I would of gave it 5 stars but needing so much room almost 5cu. feet I'm using a 1.75 dual woofer, single port box and they hit extremely well, i have 2 of them at 1 ohm and about 1300 watts. the connection points are a bit weak (easily bendable) not much distortion at higher levels but there is a tiny bit. I think it's cause of the box...otherwise decent entry lvl stuff definetly enough to shake ur mirrors, clean looking..
customer_reviews.author: Megan Alessi

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid performance.
customer_reviews.text: I've replaced these subs for my Infinity Pro subs.These Pyle subs were much bigger the the Infinitys for sure.The 4g wire mounting is a little week,but once my 4 gauge wires were installed they are not going anywhere.Rock solid performance.The sound is great in my small sealed box.Bi-wired both my subs to run 4 volt @ all 4 voice coils. 550 watts form my Alpine pushes these subs with room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: wicked

customer_reviews.title: garbage zero stars
customer_reviews.text: Garbage ass spearker had it hooked up to a 800 watt kenwood amp for 17 days before it blow I didnt have the amp adjusted to high because I was still breaking it in $85 dollar lost if your looking to buy one spend a lil more and get a better brand
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Quality and price A+
customer_reviews.text: I have been in the car audio game since the early 80's and have used products from practically all the popular names and i am currently using one these Pyle 12"s, and also a much more pricey Almani 12 powered by a audiopipe 1500 amp @1 ohm and this woofer bumps right along with my Almani so if you want a great woofer at a excellent price this would be a great choice!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Vape This!!

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great subs for the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these subwoofers to replace my JL 10W-0s that simply wore out after 8 years of metal. I was shocked by the construction and the quality of these Pyle subs. Believe it or not but these subs actually hit harder than the more expensive JL's andI would recommend these to anyone. I'm very unexpectedly suprised and happy with my new subs and they look as good as they sound.
customer_reviews.author: MGN

customer_reviews.title: sound great I live in cold weather so don't know if ...
customer_reviews.text: sound great I live in cold weather so don't know if I can blame the subwoofer but plastic for the audio wires snapped off and they salt the roads where I live and I have it in the back of my hatchback mid winter I opened my hatch to put something in back and seen that the plating on the sub is full of rust still works tho my car has no rust if that's what your wondering so if you live where they salt clear coat the plating to prevent this
customer_reviews.author: Death kight

customer_reviews.title: Failed
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for almost 2 weeks and then quit totally. No sound, nothing. Amp is fine as I can hook that channel up to another speak and there is sound. When it worked it did deliver decent low bass but could rattle at certain levels. All in all this thing is not worth it. Save your money and get a legit sub. Trust me.
customer_reviews.author: Anon This

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Deal !!!
customer_reviews.text: So... I'm an eighteen year old girl, and I don't know much about speaker. BUT I do know that this sub was only 27 bucks, and it sounds awesome. My bass sounds great. This is all I need for my car. I have a 2000 Mustang; I heard you can rattle your spoilers off, so I just bought one sub. I actually have a boss marine 800 watt amp hooked up to it (a boat amp), and I bought my box from a pawn shop. My conclusion is that I didn't spend much on any of this, but I now have a better sound in my car. (:
customer_reviews.author: Brooke(:

customer_reviews.title: My first subwoofer install.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these from Amazon last Thursday. They arrived on Tuesday. I waited until the weekend to install them. Boy was it worth the wait!! The subs were relatively simple to install. I already had a speaker box and my car was already wired with an amp and the cabling to my trunk. My teenage son is in love with them!! They sound great. I am still looking to put the best amp to them for peak performance but so far, so GOOD. I also love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Yopinch

customer_reviews.title: These Rock
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these woofers and hooked them up to a 1000 watt two channel amp. These woofers sound phenomenal. The only criticism is that they did not come with instructions for how to hook up the speaker wires - there are many options and it can get confusing. Go to Crutchfield and download the applicable diagram for your set up. Also, be prepared to tune your speaker box if you are making your own box. Enjoy - these are absolutely fantastic for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Larry Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound
customer_reviews.text: The Pyle PL1090BL 10inch Subwoofer was shipped ahead of schedule . Was recieved as promised , when installed made such a difference in my 2005 Chevy Silverado , the price of (2) Subwoofers , quality of workmanship & sound cannot be beat on these items.
customer_reviews.author: DreamBender

customer_reviews.title: Pay a little bit more for a better brand and save yourself the headache.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 1 that lasted almost a year, bought another one that didn't last but about 4 months. Ended up paying just a little bit more for a Kicker 12 and have had no problems with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: T. Allbright

customer_reviews.title: Get what u pay for sometimes a lil bit more
customer_reviews.text: I'll tell u what. I have 2 of theses bridged @ 1 ohm on a Hiphonics 1500d. That's almost 2 to 1 on RMS wattage and for the most part they eat it up. after 2 hours or so i smell coils so i turns it down for a min so what. for this price u can keep another set on deck. I also ran a rear battery with a isolator to ensure an endless power supply for my amp and the skin on my face beats of my skull to the tune. even if I popped it tomorrow it took it like a champ lol. WELL WORTH THE PRICE
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Bad Subs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 for my box to begin with, my amp is only 800 watt. One the speakers lasted 3 months so i ordered another one, out of the box its blown. Don't waste your time and money for this low quality ...... spend the extra couple dollars and get a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: Starrow

customer_reviews.title: Better put these at 4 ohms or you will fry ...
customer_reviews.text: Better put these at 4 ohms or you will fry them.. 1000 watts is not what they will handle... You only suppose to put 25% more than rms power to them... you will only get 1000 with 1 ohm anyway.... nice subs for a girl.... rpayton84@yahoo.com for any questions..
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Walker

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy These Speakers.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are the worst example of Chinese manufacturing. I bought these remembering the Pyle of the past not realizing they are now just junk. Hooked them up to a 1100watt amp and only at half volume. One didn't work to begin with, checked it and it was open circuit both coils. The other one worked barely, checked it one 4ohm coil the other 15ohm. Too expensive to freight back to USA for warranty claim. A total loss of what i paid.
customer_reviews.author: John Argent

customer_reviews.title: Rock Solid
customer_reviews.text: Good Bang for the buck...sound great. heavy and well constructed. But then it's all about the box.. a good box makes good speakers better. These were mounted in a dual 10' ported box with internal individual 2.5 cubic foot cavities for each speaker and jointly vented to center/front.... definitely resonated well. I'm pushing a true 250 watt rms thru each these with a Sony dual channel amp and it's adequate for my listening. Anyone expectin to hear the thump a block away get real..10" speakers are not intended to push that much volume even with long throw woofers, half a block away sure these will do it....
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: buick rumble
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with a 3 way cross over, the sub woofer is amazing for the price, it hits harder then my last two 12 inch subs I had. Cheap and good quality, recommend if your putting it in a trunk. However I have a ported box, which might make the speaker give it a "phock" noise, a trimmed the opening in the port to make it rumble and hit harder. The "phock" noise cannot be heard in the passenger cabin of my car, only when I open my trunk, still sounds amazing. P.S. I'm running a single 1200 watt amp and the 3 way Legacy crossover.
customer_reviews.author: buick rumble

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy setup
customer_reviews.text: I use these with my Pyle 4,000 watt bridgable which I dont bridege at 2000 watts. These speakers seemed to be made of sturdy material. I Crank it up and the handle it. I have not turned all the way up so im not sure if they would blow but they are a great prodcut for a decent price. If your not looking for competition then I would chose these.
customer_reviews.author: Sully

customer_reviews.title: Great sub for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little sub. I don't have the equipment to push it to its peak of 1200 watts but it is still awesome. The framing is very solid. I highly recommend this to anyone who doesn't want to blow hundreds of dollars on a sub.
customer_reviews.author: FundinFTW

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Ran in 2ohm mode, never abused and allowed for a 2 week break in period lasted about a month and a half, one of the coils failed which then caused the other one to subsequently fail, when it died the volume was very low, it just cut out, checked the impedance of one coil and it was 150Kiloohms however i could push it by hand back to the 4ohm spec however it didnt hold, running a boss 1100 mono block amp 8ga wire with a kenwood head unit
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Like the siund quality and the color of the speakers. Still jamming out to good music.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin  Henry

customer_reviews.title: This one is a beast
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker with a 1400 watt Pyle amp 2 channel I like my amp but this speaker is a beast and it's hungry for power!!! This one is a keeper... If u dont do anything else make sure your amp is no joke..
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sub to hook up in my car that would be able to shake the car but nothing to crazy. I bought 1 sub and have it in a vented box and it hits hard. Now im going to be getting a 12" BOSS to complete my system. If you are looking for something cheap thats works great, this is the sub that you need.
customer_reviews.author: andrew11

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: They are pretty good subs for the price I got 2 of them. I have a 600 watt amp on them now and they seem to be fine I'm getting a bigger amp soon then we can do the real test. For the reviews saying they are junk I'm pretty sure they just don't know how to wire audio equipment. I would give 5 stars but the packaging was a little bad on them they looked as if they were returned and one of the speakers had a dent on the bottom where the magnet is. All around great buy I highly recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ryder

customer_reviews.title: DISJOINTED, Yet PYLE's "BRAND Still Resonates Good with Me
customer_reviews.text: NOT what I Expected from Pyle (a Name I've Trusted for OVER 20 years) They've ALWAYS Produced among the BEST Speakers I've Ever Bought and Owned, but THIS PARTICULAR Driver, Simply Didn't make the grade based on the SPL and Response for MY CHOICE of Enclosure. But as an Audiophile and Professional DJ for Over 25 years, and Professional Audio Installer. MY STANDARDS are Much More Critical than Most. NEVERTHELESS it is Well Constructed, and a GREAT VALUE and I would Recommend a CUSTOM ENCLOSURE based SPECIFICALLY on the Thiele small parameters. (which COULD NOT BE FOUND ANYWHERE ON THE DESCRIPTION, short of the Sensitivity) 2 Thumbs Down for THAT ALONE!
customer_reviews.author: MusicMan

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This Sub woofer is good for the price just do not have sun exposure or it will lose it seal this can handle 5oo rms easy wright now i got about 350 rms to two of these each and its good but could handle more just remember no sun exposure and you should be fine with these .
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, good price
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these before and have had good luck with them. They sound great and the price is reasonable. If I needed to buy any more I would.
customer_reviews.author: Woodie

customer_reviews.title: Seems Good
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and sound great in my bandpass box. There was like, no packing material around the subs to keep them safe, One of the speakers had actually broken out of one of the boxes. Even though they are 30$ some care in keeping them safe would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: trash
customer_reviews.text: The thing blew in less than 20 minutes. What do you expect for a $100 18 inch though? Don't waste your money, save it, and buy something you'll actually be able to use and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: becca

customer_reviews.title: Happy to  have a new and wonderful woofer.
customer_reviews.text: I received it on time. It has a cool blue color to it. And I was happy for all of the memories I have of being in a band; I hope too spend with this .
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Nice speakers for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers for the price, worked out well for my Jeep Wrangler sport....worked great in the cabinet I purchased, great sound
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Jones

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Running to a directed 600d at 2 ohm in 28hz tuning 4.3 cubes ....Got this 18 for temporary sounds until the car gets fixed. I was shocked when i took it out for a pyle it has a decently sized motor. The basket did not impress me it is fairly weak material but it looks awesome. So i hooked it up facing up with the port back. It is just as loud as the two soundqubed hds2 12s i had on 500rms but still breaking in.... Doesnt get very low. 35hz is prob the lowest for saftey of the coil. But other then that its decent for starters
customer_reviews.author: lane b.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sub for 30 bucks!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sub and put it in a tube enclosure and it hits really hard.I have two bazooka tube enclosures that were laying around so i replaced one bazooka tube with a Rockford Fosgate Prime R2D4 and it sounds pretty good but this Pyle sub just hits really nice im gunna scrap my Fosgate sub and buy another Pyle!
customer_reviews.author: thatank79

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy from warehouse deals!
customer_reviews.text: Warehouse deals shipped my 37 pound order in a flimsy box with only thin brown wrapping paper as cussion, the box was completly riped up, and abel to see inside by the time it got to my house. One of my subwoofers was broken, the back wasnt eaven attached to the sub. The other one i bought was dented beyond abel to put it in a subwoofer box. And if your orders broke they cant replace it because it was apart of a deal. Its prolbly cheaper for me to try to fix it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Doglover

customer_reviews.title: needs to specify
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sb not knowing it could only be ran as 2ohm. Unfortunately I bought a 4 ohm amp that was not 2 ohm stable.. Good sub when the amp wasnt in protect mode.. When you buy this sub makesure you get a 2ohm stable amp to run this sub..
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker for money!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great speaker for the money!! Have 2of them hooked up to a kicker 250 amp and they slam!!. Great clear bass. Alough powered by a 2500watt amp they sounded a little distorted. So just hooked up to the kicker 250 they shut it off but still get great bass. Also hooked up in a jeep so being in open space compared to a trunk May be differnt
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: Receive speaker it was dented from Shipping paid $40 to have basket straightened played for 4 days then started smoking terrible speaker pyle of junk..
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Love it. I got two 12 inch choppers and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I got two 12 inch choppers and 2 12 inch drivers and past five years still going strong. Pyle is the best
customer_reviews.author: Edward haynes jr

customer_reviews.title: Boom boom...
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker.. Looks great.. Sounds even better.. Easy hook up.. Best sub i have ever bought.. Dual hookups for high power input.. Love it...
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Sub for the budget minded!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Sub Pyle PL1090BL 10-Inch 1,000-Watt DVC Subwoofer hooked this up to a BOSS Audio R1100M Riot 1100-watts Monoblock Class A/B 1 Channel amp and am very pleased with the setup. Handles everything I've thrown at it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Toad

customer_reviews.title: very good if you know how to hook them up
customer_reviews.text: i bought two of these have a spx pro audio box like in one of the pics with a pyramid 1000w mosfet amp had them wired a 1 ohm and was not happy the amp shut off thought i got bad subs then i wired them at 4 ohm wired in parrelle or however you spell it they sound grate well worth the money they beat harder then my friends 15 inch kicker comps they have a purple color to them but the look and sound grate
customer_reviews.author: mitch

customer_reviews.title: its great!!!
customer_reviews.text: i love the sound for the low price and without a box. i have to wait till my box comes but i know for sure its going to sound great..thanks amazon
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Demon crust w/extra awesome sauce!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great price and beefy enough to tickle your sack.....seriously. Throw on some Venetian Snares or Aphex Twin and disturb everyone within 100ft. Oh, and opted for next day shipping and received it 16 hours later. Nice considering my 12 year old and myself go into serious bass withdrawals which can be downright miserable.
customer_reviews.author: David Sneddon

customer_reviews.title: 15" Pyle Blue Wave Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace an aged pair of drivers in my acoustic suspension Mach One Speakers from Radio Shack. At first I though that these would not cut it. However after swapping out the blown woofers, I have found these to be a perfect match. They don't really start to wake up until 75 watts but once they do ...look out. Very tight bass and tons of power handling.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: speakers
customer_reviews.text: when it got to my house i opened it up and the outer rim was bent on both of the speakers and there was a dents on the bottom of the magnet
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a friend last summer. Is a good product for the cost, it performs as expected. good starting woofer.
customer_reviews.author: boby

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price for good subs .have not had any problems with them at all .have had a few pairs of pyles and a few other brands over the last twenty years.have always gone back to pyle though.always a good long lasting product at a very affordable price. Always the most boom for the buck
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: good if on a budget
customer_reviews.text: good if on a budget,get what you pay for.hits the boomy bass well,all the other notes,not so good.bout 400 watts less power handling.....!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: don't buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sucks......had it for three months or so.....now it sounds blown......built poorly...very disappointed i can not return this item....never buying pyle brand again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Marotti

customer_reviews.title: ... that's trying to push 2 1200 watt they look great too counldnt be happier
customer_reviews.text: i have two of these n my 98 jetta gt the hit alright but not as hard as I thought but then again I only running 1 1600 watt mano amp that's trying to push 2 1200 watt they look great too counldnt be happier. all I need is stronger amp to push them
customer_reviews.author: Luis V.

customer_reviews.title: very nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: sealed compressed board box 17in tall 26in wide 14in deep sealed. sony xplode 1200watt 2chanel amp bridged left/right sounds crisp and clean very powerful sub amp is only on half power settings I had it on max power to see how much it can take and it handeled it great. I approve
customer_reviews.author: Brian Silka

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very well worth the money speakers pound. I would recommend these to anyone looking for a pounding system on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: jason mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Really really good
customer_reviews.text: These are some really good subs, I didn't know what I was getting in to, trying to save some money I needed a good subs for the price, I am very pleased with the performance of these subs. I had these subs in a sealed box, and they were screaming for more, so I put them in a pro box and they have been beating up my trunk ever since, sounds like a pissed off gorilla!
customer_reviews.author: BrandonXJ

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: What like about them was they sound good and I never had no problem with them
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Pope

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: This sub-woofer has outstanding performance for its class. at $40.00, i'm surprised at how hard this thing kicks. And It's a Dual-Coil which is not stated in the desc. so if you buy this speaker make sure you hook up the other terminals for the other coil, OR YOU WILL FRY THIS THING. but all in all, outstanding performance at a low price!
customer_reviews.author: Bradyn

customer_reviews.title: BASS BASS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Powerful bass!! make sure you get a 250 watt rms amp. This thing will jump!
customer_reviews.author: Aramis Villar

customer_reviews.title: sucks
customer_reviews.text: 1 subwoofer sounds better than 2. I bought two of these subwoofers and they were hooked to a 1000 watt amp on one of them busted. All leading up to this the subwoofers got hot. All around the subwoofer suck dont buy these.
customer_reviews.author: frederick

customer_reviews.title: Sent with care; Sound of clean bass
customer_reviews.text: Great sub. Sounds amazing with my other identical sub bought previously. Great package handling.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Marie

customer_reviews.title: Has the power!
customer_reviews.text: When i ordered this i was skeptical however what i received was brain rattling bass, its deep tone and reverb along with the ability to bridge makes this my favorite sub i have had.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas West

customer_reviews.title: Good if they are warm
customer_reviews.text: I live in minnesota and these subs don't work in the cold they take about 30 minutes to warm up so I wouldn't buy if you live in a cold place but when they are warm they are awesome
customer_reviews.author: Matt Moore

customer_reviews.title: bump hard
customer_reviews.text: these subs bump, took at least a month to break em in i have 2 of them hooked up to a 2300 watt pyle amp. after listening to some tech n twiztid they bumb. they dont seem to wake up till half way, not shure if its my subs or amp but i dont listen to it down anyway, who does with subs
customer_reviews.author: wishmaker420

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift for my 15 year old son
customer_reviews.text: He was totally suprised and installed them the next day. My son loves these speakers and they sound great in his truck.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Raffield

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND/GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I've got a set of these in 12's. and they sound great. My new project required 10's so I went with these.I telling you straight you won't find a better 10"sub for this price. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: ted1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great fells well made lovig the flames on it
customer_reviews.author: cesar flores

customer_reviews.title: I likah da bass!
customer_reviews.text: This was a suprise for such a cheap sub. I actually bought two because the first one was great and now I have a full system. The hit just as hard as my brothers two 12' pioneers so I have no problem with them. I fully recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: cheap garbage...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful speaker but a piece of junk! Speaker was blown. Asked for an exchange and was told it would cost me just as much for shipping to do the exchange as it cost for the speaker.
customer_reviews.author: xavious

customer_reviews.title: if you're looking for a good cheap sub get it
customer_reviews.text: Am very impressed with this speaker...if you're looking for a good cheap sub get it...you won't be disappointed....
customer_reviews.author: Jason Phillips

customer_reviews.title: 6 months max
customer_reviews.text: bought 2 and ran them on a 1000 watt amp and both blew up at the same time pretty decent when it worked i wish i had more power but i wouldnt recomend this if you want it to bang for a long time
customer_reviews.author: Sal Aljabbary

customer_reviews.title: Nice Kick
customer_reviews.text: Kick from the Sub is Clean,Loud and Body Feeling(you can feel the Sound From the Sub).Not Bad for the Price
customer_reviews.author: bigben47a

customer_reviews.title: Love the sub hits real hard had no problems with ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the sub hits real hard had no problems with it great price sounds great I would get it again
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These subwoofers hit hard! I have had them for over a year and still hit as hard as day 1. Great for the price. Great for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Susskraut

customer_reviews.title: I was very impressed, and have plans to buy ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed,and have plans to buy 2 ,12"speakers for my big box. Its killing me to wait man.But thats how it goes when ya live on a fixed income.
customer_reviews.author: David Sibrel

customer_reviews.title: great sub
customer_reviews.text: no prboems with it at all will be buying more at first chance still thumping hard nicely built speaker also appearances are nice deep blue, price is great for it also would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Napier

customer_reviews.title: These sub's lasted less than a year I had a ...
customer_reviews.text: These sub's lasted less than a year I had a 1400 watt Pyle amp to these 1200 watt speakers and won't hold up to it
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: I love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: I only have maybe 100 hours on the beast, and it is still as tight and crisp as the day I got it. It rummbles the entire driveway and I only got 300 watts going to it. Components are excellent but casing is boarderline. The speaker itself completely makes up for the low grade metal used. I mounted mine in wood of course, but as long as the thing is mounted it sounds incredable. I set it off with two 6x9 pyle 125oz. magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Harold Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Great Company. Always a wonderful product with affordable pricing. I've purchased many subwoofers over the years and Pyle has never disappointed, great bang for the buck. Superb sound, excellent quality in workmanship esthetics and function.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: swolid speaker
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 subs for my brothers 03 S10 P/U. sound great, hit hard for the average Joe. A must buy if looking!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Been using the subs for a couple weeks now and still working great! Packageing was a little messed up on the inside of the box but still everything works fine, I emailed them and they replied within 24 hours
customer_reviews.author: Ward

customer_reviews.title: Pyles rock
customer_reviews.text: love Pyle... always sounds so clear in any vehicle its put in!!

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with this product, and the shipping, also customer support.
customer_reviews.text: These subwoofers arrived promptly, were easy to install and perform to my highest expectations. I would definitely recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy kennedy

customer_reviews.title: high quality
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these speakers, they got here quickly and they sound great !!!!!! I would definitely recommend for any application be it auto or home theater.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Noble

customer_reviews.title: pyle
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers and hooked them up to a 1000 watt xplod amp and they hit hard its moves the roof of my 2005 f150 im satisfied with these speakers cant beat it for the price and sound good for some tens
customer_reviews.author: texas made cc

customer_reviews.title: Deff buying more!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I put one 10" in my home sub box and I have never heard more thump, bass, lows, etc... I deff recommend this for ANY system!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Kicking Speakers
customer_reviews.text: I used these to replace 15" midbass woofers in a PA system. They have really deep tones and pound hard, I would imagine in a car sub box these speakers would pound really hard. They def are worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: johns3620

customer_reviews.text: This iteam wasnt working at all wen i bought it now they want let me return it and get a better one.
customer_reviews.author: Lamika Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Good Sub
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the $30 price tag. Sounds good and works well for the midrange bass. If deep tones are what you're after, then get a bigger sub.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this subwoofers for my pick up truck, they are defenetly more than I hoped for. They arrived in time. If you are looking for quality and a good deal... Get them.
customer_reviews.author: Smokie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good subwoofer as long as you know what u are doing when hooking them up.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Slomick

customer_reviews.title: It didn't meet my expectations it blew out a week ...
customer_reviews.text: It didn't meet my expectations it blew out a week ago and is no longer working is there a warranty on this item

customer_reviews.text: its a good sub its loud but i have an under powered amp i need to get rid of so i cant properly rate this sub.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A must have vary good Buy Buy Buy you will not be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: My very first Subwoofer. and i half to say it RATTLES my truck. A must have Sub, you wont regret it
customer_reviews.author: Zackary Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: They sound great for the money. They're definitely not the best but good for the budget conscious.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: its not built for the high wattage posted but its great sound im going to get 2 for my girl
customer_reviews.author: qjuan

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect when I only paid $40 for a subwoofer and I have never used Pyle before but when I hooked it up to my Sony 1200 watt amp I was amazed!! I can't believe how it THUMPS and how good the quality of sound is. My Ram 1500 quad cab is booming. I recommend this to anyone who enjoys good quality sound or for those who just want hard hitting (thumping) bass. I can't wait till I get another one. I can only imagine what two of them will sound like. TWO THUMBS UP!!!
customer_reviews.author: charles eldreth

product_meta.title: Car Vehicle Subwoofer Audio Speaker - 10 Inch Blue Injection Molded Cone, Blue Chrome-Plated Steel Basket, Dual Voice Coil 4 Ohm Impedance, 1000W Power, for Vehicle Stereo Sound System - Pyle PL1090BL
product_meta.description: Vehicle Speaker Size:10-inch| Speakers Maximum Output Power:1000 Watts| Voice Coil:Dual 4-ohmPyle PL1090BL 10-Inch 1,000-Watt DVC Subwoofer
feature_bullets: 1000 WATT POWER: This 10-inch car subwoofer has a power of 500 Watt RMS to 1000 Watt peak that will produce high sound resonance. It also has silver-plated speaker terminals that will maximize sound quality while minimizing noise and distortion

70 OZ MAGNET STRUCTURE: Built with 70 oz. magnet and a rubber magnet boot that will enhance car stereo or radio by producing powerful audio and unmatched performance. It comes with a sensitivity or SPL of 83.5dB to resonate perfect clarity

2” DUAL KAPTON VOICE COIL: The speaker subwoofer comes with a 4 Ohm impedance per coil that can be wired as 4 or 8 Ohm. The 2” high-temperature dual Kapton voice coil resists corrosion. Works in any time of enclosure - sealed, vented, or open-air

CHROME-PLATED STEEL BASKET: Features bumped vented extended pole piece and designed with a non-fatiguing suspension to keep equipment safe. It is a clean-cut car subwoofer that boasts a blue injection-molded cone & blue chrome-plated steel basket

6.20” MOUNTING DEPTH: Easy to install w/ 6.20" mounting depth & 10.16" overall diameter, fits most audio system for cars, boats or RVs. The flat progressive spider design improves the speaker's mechanical stability, increasing the life of the speaker
High-temperature dual Kapton voice coil; Chrome-plated basket

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars386 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
